title: Tom Hardy's Wife Charlotte Riley Has Given Birth To Their First Child
text:
Tom Hardy's Wife Charlotte Riley Has Given Birth To... Tom Hardy's Wife Charlotte Riley Has Given Birth To Their First Child Tom Hardy Charlotte Riley 
They welcome their new arrival only weeks after they announced the pregnancy. 
A big congratulations to Tom Hardy and his wife Charlotte Riley , who have just welcomed their first child as a couple. The pair have only been married for just over a year and we've only known about the pregnancy for a few weeks, so it's a happy surprise for fans. Tom Hardy and Charlotte Riley show off the bump at Legend premiere 
While the birth marks the British actors' first time becoming parents together, it sees Hardy become a father for the second time around, after his 7-year-old son Louis with whom he had with former girlfriend Rachel Speed. 
It's a thrilling eventuality, as we only heard the news that Riley was expecting a baby when she joined her dashing husband on the blue carpet at the world premiere of Hardy's new film 'Legend', held at the Odeon in Leicester Square on September 3rd 2015. The 33-year-old 'World Without End' star looked positively glowing with sultry smoky eye make-up, hair chopped to her chin, and a brave long-sleeved black dress that showed off her prominent bump. And it was just last weekend that they were spotted strolling through the city hand in hand, looking extremely content - no doubt very excited for their new arrival.
